attributes.action: The price of travel cards is too expensive.
attributes.background: Travelling around London becomes rapidly expensive for people to feel able to travel around London freely for the day. It limits people's ability to visit touristic sites across London, with the initial cost of travel.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
